aside.description: AppShell.Aside configuration, controls width, breakpoints and collapsed state. Required if you use AppShell.Aside component.
aside.description_zh: AppShell.Aside 配置，控制宽度、断点和折叠状态。如果使用 AppShell.Aside 组件，则是必需的。

disabled.description: If set, Navbar, Aside, Header and Footer components be hidden
disabled.description_zh: 如果设置，则隐藏 Navbar、Aside、Header 和 Footer 组件

footer.description: AppShell.Footer configuration, controls height, offset and collapsed state. Required if you use AppShell.Footer component.
footer.description_zh: AppShell.Footer 配置，控制高度、偏移和折叠状态。如果您使用 AppShell.Footer 组件，则是必需的。

header.description: AppShell.Header configuration, controls height, offset and collapsed state. Required if you use AppShell.Header component.
header.description_zh: AppShell.Header 配置，控制高度、偏移量和折叠状态。如果您使用 AppShell.Header 组件，则是必需的。

layout.description: Determines how Navbar/Aside are arranged relative to Header/Footer, default by default
layout.description_zh: 确定导航栏/旁栏相对于页眉/页脚的排列方式，默认为

navbar.description: AppShell.Navbar configuration, controls width, breakpoints and collapsed state. Required if you use AppShell.Navbar component.
navbar.description_zh: AppShell.Navbar 配置，控制宽度、断点和折叠状态。如果您使用 AppShell.Navbar 组件，则为必需。

offsetScrollbars.description: Determines whether Header and Footer components should include styles to offset scrollbars. Based on react-remove-scroll. true by default
offsetScrollbars.description_zh: 确定 Header 和 Footer 组件是否应包含用于偏移滚动条的样式。基于 react-remove-scroll。默认为 true

padding.description: Controls padding of the main section, 0 by default. Important: use padding prop instead of p.
padding.description_zh: 控制 main 部分的填充，默认为 0。重要提示：使用 padding prop 而不是 p。

transitionDuration.description: Duration of all transitions in ms, 200 by default
transitionDuration.description_zh: 所有过渡的持续时间（以毫秒为单位），默认为 200

transitionTimingFunction.description: Timing function of all transitions, ease by default
transitionTimingFunction.description_zh: 所有过渡的定时功能，默认为 ease

withBorder.description: Determines whether associated components should have a border, true by default
withBorder.description_zh: 确定关联的组件是否应具有边框，默认情况下为 true

zIndex.description: z-index of all associated elements, 200 by default
zIndex.description_zh: 所有关联元素的 z 索引，默认为 200
